reviewText:
Saw this previewed on another SWV title. I know that sometimes a preview can show the best bits and when you see the full movie it can fall short of expectations but this proved to be as good as the clips predicted.
Its about a woman who's husband has vanished on an exotic island/voodoo/devil worship etc.she travels to try and find him but soon finds she is also in mortal danger. A cryptic ending for the viewer to think about adds to the interest. Recommended.

If you like the 1970's nudity blaxiploitation films like i do.. You'll love this.. The movie is full of sex and nudity for no reason. 70's soft porn at its best... Decent plot.. Hard to understand why certain things were going on but i won't complain.. lol
